name: Medusa
title: Gorgon
lore: Medusa was once a beautiful woman, transformed by jealous gods into a monster. Her gaze turns enemies to stone.

splitShot.name: Split Shot
splitShot.description: Medusa's arrows split to hit multiple targets at reduced damage.

mysticSnake.name: Mystic Snake
mysticSnake.description: A snake that bounces between enemies, stealing mana and dealing increasing damage.

manaShield.name: Mana Shield
manaShield.description: Creates a shield that uses mana to absorb damage.

stoneGaze.name: Stone Gaze
stoneGaze.description: Enemies facing Medusa slowly turn to stone, becoming stunned and taking bonus physical damage.
